resources.string: … to Qwotable. In the following, you will see features and instructions of Qwotable.
Qwotable is an ad-free application for you to relax and focus on Qwotable\'s content!
Qwotable\'s content are quotes and wisdom. It is made for you to relax and fill your brain with deep sentences.
Qwotable has a lot of quotable stuff that will be updated from time to time. You will recognize it, because the newer the Qwotable, the more on the top it will be!
Besides the quotes and wisdom pages, Qwotable offers a page with the quotes and wisdom, based on the author. You simply have to tap on the authors name to get there! Same goes for the found-in.
Get the latest information of Qwotable in the Information page. For that, all you need to do is to swipe down to the bottom of the Homepage and click on "Information"
Simply click on the button below on or swipe to go on.
Tap the button below to use Qwotable
Connect to the internet to see information
"There was an error while getting the current information. I try my best to make it work again asap"
There was an error while parsing the Qwotable. If it keeps happening, have a look at Information. If there is no post about the issue already, feel free to write an error entry
Connect to the internet to see Qwotable
You want to get beta updates
You don\'t want to get beta updates
If you think a quote or a wisdom is not in this app currently, but you want it to be here, you can request it.
Your system language currently is not officially supported, therefore the language has been set to English
I am sorry, if you found a bug. Please send it to me. Make sure to have screenshots (optional, works only in GitHub) and also a step-by-step instruction, so I can reproduce the bug (required).
If you think, you have found a feature that is a must-have for this application, feel free to request it. Who knows, maybe I will add it ;)
Look! I have found an Android application, that has quotes and wisdom!
You want to give me feedback to my app? Sure!

Qwotable needs following permissions:

Full internet access:
Since Qwotable gets its data from the internet, it is required to check, if an internet connection is available.

Install unknown apps:
This is required, so Qwotable is able to install the update.

Qwotable is a free Android application, made by me, Luca.
Qwotable does not collect any data and never will.
Every interaction with me is selectable.

I may change the Privacy Policy.
Every change is effective immediately.
An information of the change of the Privacy Policy can be found on the changelog

Effective January 29, 2023

Like other apps, Qwotable uses content that is not mine. In the following, this dialog will tell you about the used content:

Lottie Animations: Lottie animations are the moving pictures that are playing in the presentation-screen and the error screen. The Lottie animations I used are signed under the Lottie Simple License, therefore it is not necessary to give credits to every creator. Though I am thankful for their work, I must confess that I can't remember every author.

Rikka-Material: With Rikka-material, I mean the content of the settings activity such as the categories and switch.
Qwotable has its own Wiki-page, created thanks to GitBook. There you will find extra information to Qwotable.
A new version of this app is available. Go to Settings, click on Updater and then on Update now, or simply click on this card.
A newer beta version of this app is available. Go to Settings, click on Updater and then on Update now, or simply click on this card
Connect to the internet to see quotes
There was an error while trying to get the quotes. If there is not already an information, feel free to report the issue.
There was an error while trying to get the wisdom. If there is not already an information, feel free to report the issue.
Connect to the internet to see wisdom
Please connect to the internet first
Horse: \'Life is difficult, but you are loved.\'
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

Quotes are passages from books, games and movies as well as from songs or public speeches. Usually, the author and the name of the book/movie/song/game is mentioned in the credits. In this app it looks like the example above.
Here you can see the quote, the author and (in this case) the movie where the quote can be found.
Boy: \'What is the bravest thing you\'ve ever said?\' Horse: \'Help. Asking for help isn\'t giving up, it is refusing to give up.\'
The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

In this app, wisdoms are stories/tales that is teaching you of something. It is not always clear, what the wisdom is teaching you. Usually, the author, as well as the book/game/movie is mentioned in the credits. In this app it looks like in the example above.
Here you can see the wisdom, the author and (in this case) the game where the wisdom can be found.
Check for newer versions of the application
See the changelog of previous changes
You found a bug? Send it to me!
You have a suggestion? Send it to me!
Share it with you friends and your friends\' friends
What is your opinion to this app? Go on and tell me!
You have a quote or a wisdom that is not in this app?
Read about the importance of your privacy to me.
